snippet: The owner of the Crepes du Nord cafe in New York's financial district has started cloning the French- and Scandinavian-inspired creperie in shopping mall kiosks.
abstract: The owner of the Crepes du Nord cafe in New York's financial district has started cloning the French- and Scandinavian-inspired creperie in shopping mall kiosks.

headline.main: Crepes du Nord Heads for the Malls
